tit.cmt: タイトルのため、Arata/Shin→Arataのみとしました。

sen.j: 宝生新（ほうしょう あらた／しん、明治3年10月23日 (旧暦)（1870年11月16日） - 昭和19年（1944年）6月10日）はワキ方宝生流能楽師。
sen.e: Arata/Shin HOSHO (November 16, 1870 - June 10, 1944) was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of supporting actors (waki-kata).
Arata/Shin HOSHO (November 16, 1870 - June 10, 1944) was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of waki-kata (supporting actors).
Arata/Shin HOSHO (November 16, 1870 - June 10, 1944) was a Noh actor of the Hosho school of waki-kata (supporting actors).

sen.j: ワキ方宝生流十世宗家。
sen.e: The 10th head of the Hosho school of supporting actors
The 10th head of the Hosho school of waki-kata.
sen.cmt: supporting actors→waki-kataとし、ピリオド追加
sen.e: The 10th head of the Hosho school of waki-kata.
His real name was Asataro HOSHO.
His real name was Asataro HOSHO.
His real name was Asataro HOSHO.

sen.j: 八世宝生新朔の子として東京に生まれる。
sen.e: He was born in Tokyo as a son of Shinsaku HOSHO the 8th.
He was born in Tokyo as a son of Shinsaku HOSHO, the Eighth head of the school.
sen.cmt: the 8th→, the Eighth head of the schoolとしました。
sen.e: He was born in Tokyo as a son of Shinsaku HOSHO, the Eighth head of the school.

sen.j: 九世宝生金五郎英周は叔父に当たる。
sen.e: Kingoro Eishu HOSHO the 9th was his uncle.
Kingoro Eishu HOSHO, the Ninth head of the school, was his uncle.
sen.cmt: the 9th→, the Ninth head of the school, としました。
sen.e: Kingoro Eishu HOSHO, the Ninth head of the school, was his uncle.

sen.j: 明治・大正・昭和期に活躍し、名人と謳われる。
sen.e: He distinguished himself through the Meiji, Taisho, and Showa periods, and was celebrated as a master of Noh.
He distinguished himself through the Meiji, Taisho, and Showa periods, and was celebrated as a master of Noh.
He distinguished himself through the Meiji, Taisho, and Showa periods, and was celebrated as a master of Noh.

sen.j: 夏目漱石に謡を教えたことでも知られる。
sen.e: He was known for teaching a Noh chant to Soseki NATSUME.
He was known for teaching a Noh chant to Soseki NATSUME.
He was known for teaching a Noh chant to Soseki NATSUME.
Akihiko HOSHO is his son.
Akihiko HOSHO is his son.
Akihiko HOSHO is his son.

sen.j: 女婿に森茂好、孫に森常好。
sen.e: Shigeyoshi MORI is his son-in-law; Tsuneyoshi MORI is his grandson.
Shigeyoshi MORI is his son-in-law; Tsuneyoshi MORI is his grandson.
Shigeyoshi MORI is his son-in-law; Tsuneyoshi MORI is his grandson.

sen.j: 次女の女婿に宝生弥一、孫に宝生閑。
sen.e: Yaichi HOSHO is his second daughter's husband; Kan HOSHO is his grandson.
Yaichi HOSHO is his second daughter's husband; Kan HOSHO is his grandson.
Yaichi HOSHO is his second daughter's husband; Kan HOSHO is his grandson.
